kDesc
If your friend already has Whimsy Hollow, send them this so they can blend in with their whimsical little pals. [#Legal]
Si vos amis possèdent déjà Whimsy Hollow, envoyez-leur ceci pour qu'ils puissent se mêler à leurs fantasques petits compagnons. [#Legal]
Wenn ein Freund von dir bereits Putzigheim besitzt, dann schick ihm doch diesen schönen Schweif, damit er mit seinen putzigen kleinen Freunden mithalten kann. [#Legal]
Se i tuoi amici hanno già la Tana Stravagante, mandagli quest'oggetto così si intoneranno ai loro piccoli amici stravaganti. [#Legal]
Si tu amigo ya tiene el Whimsy Hollow, envíasela para que vaya acorde con sus pequeños amigos extravagantes. [#Legal]
If your friend already has Whimsy Hollow, send them this so they can blend in with their whimsical little pals. [#Legal]
